ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Visibility of CrawlScope Logger
ygData.msgSnippet: ... What if I added an accessor instead? Is there a reason why you do not want to add a logger to your subclass? Yours, St.Ack

hc696_9 wrote:

> Can you please change the visibility of Logger in Class
> org.archive.crawler.framework.CrawlScope from:
> "static final Logger logger =
> Logger.getLogger(CrawlScope.class.getName());"
> back to
> "protected static final Logger logger =
> Logger.getLogger(CrawlScope.class.getName());"
>
> otherwise it's not possible to access it from other packages. Sorry,
> I'm not one of your developers and can't update this change to your
> CVS.
>
> Thanks, Adrian
>
What if I added an accessor instead?

Is there a reason why you do not want to add a logger to your subclass?

Yours,
St.Ack
